articles.title: Twitter to double engineering headcount in Singapore regional office by 2023 - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: Twitter intends to double its number of engineers at its engineering centre in Singapore - where its Asia Pacific headquarters is located - to more than 100 by next year, the social media giant announced on Tuesday (Jan 25).

articles.title: Ten years in 10 minutes: Matildas' Asian Cup win over the Philippines was a return to the past and a glimpse of the future - ABC News
articles.description: With so much focus on the past leading into the Matildas' second group match against the Philippines, what we got instead was a glimpse into the national team's future.

articles.title: Asian shares, U.S. futures slide as traders fret about Ukraine, rate rises - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares and U.S. futures tumbled on Tuesday after a tumultuous Wall Street session, with investors nervous about the situation in Ukraine and eyeing the U.S. Federal Reserve amid worries about a move to tighter monetary policy globally.
articles.content: HONG KONG, Jan 25 (Reuters) - Asian shares and U.S. futures tumbled on Tuesday after a tumultuous Wall Street session, with investors nervous about the situation in Ukraine and eyeing the U.S. Federa… [+3301 chars]
